description_expanded: Better Homes & Gardens Cherry Blossom & Santal Fragrance Oil is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. Fragrance oil for oil warmers and diffusers. Features a blend of floral cherry blossom and warm, woody sandalwood (santal). Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
